definitions.text: a jointly owned commercial enterprise (usually organized by farmers or consumers) that produces and distributes goods and services and is run for the benefit of its owners
an association formed and operated for the benefit of those using it
involving the joint activity of two or more
examples: the conjunct influence of fire and strong wind
the conjunctive focus of political opposition

definitions.text: done with or working with others for a common purpose or benefit
willing to adjust to differences in order to obtain agreement
